ygData.subject: Re: Research quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Where exactly is this gypsy?  I think I talked to every Gypsy in N Karana, and nothing.  Do you need a certain faction?  I can t get them to say anything to
ygData.messageBody:
Where exactly is this gypsy? I think I talked to every Gypsy in N Karana,
and nothing. Do you need a certain faction? I can't get them to say
anything to me.


----- Original Message -----
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, August 07, 1999 9:32 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Research


> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> This is training only book so you must also give a gypsy some lesser
> lightstones to get 2 training recipe books wich will help you create
> training runes so you can get some practice in research before spanding
> real runes.
>
>
> At 11.57 07/08/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
> >
> >I am new at researching, and got the book from the gypsy woman in North
> >Karana for giving her a greater lightstone. Is this the book you put
runes
> >into? I heard that the book you purchase is called a lexicon, but this
book
> >has a different name. I am level 22 and have failed repeatedly at making
> >level 16 spells. Thanks for any info.
> >
> >Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
